root.title: first execut corp fexc give unit fund
root.body: first execut corp sai princip subsidiari contribut 152 mln dlr on divis cover credit wrongfulli take 1983 1985 regulatori account statement compani sai execut life insur co give capit infus subsidiari execut life insur co new york sai new fund bring 280 mln dlr compani receiv parent past three year execut life insur co new york admit violat state insur law pai fine 250,000 dlr levi new york insur depart accord compani execut life new york take credit reinsur agreement provid less protect insur policyhold new york rule requir accord publish report
